text:
Hellow, hows your day doing?. 
will be trying to teach myself how to rigg, Im checking tutorials right now. I been shorting stuff with the uni and that's why Ive been a bit absent

Also, you think in my case it be worth to try to fix a showreel with the content I have now, maybe adding the content for this Christmas (animating an already rigged character) and try to get an internship?

Morning Maria :) my week going well thanks, work just suddenly went from really quiet to really busy which happens a lot, so be prepared for that hah. Yes definitely worth putting together a showreel, a 45 to 60 second reel would be the best to aim for. It'll be tempting to put everything in it but make sure it stays snappy, shorter is better. Either keep your name/email/number at the bottom for the whole video or clearly at the start and end. The thing to decide now is to decide which discipline you want to apply for?

Here are my reels for reference:

Student reel:
<https://youtu.be/XNZaAhoGhA8>

Artist reel:
<https://youtu.be/rqksR4Pp5N0>
(please don't share this one, as its copyright material of course)

Hope that helps!

text: Will see what interests me the most
